# Pager

export LESS="-R"  # Raw color codes

# History
export HISTSIZE=10000
export HISTFILESIZE=20000
export HISTCONTROL="ignoredups:erasedups"

# Colors
export CLICOLOR=1
export LSCOLORS="ExGxBxDxCxEgEdxbxgxcxd"
export GREP_COLOR="1;32"

# Locale
export LANG="en_US.UTF-8"
export LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"

# Development
export PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE=1
export PIP_REQUIRE_VIRTUALENV=true
export COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1

# PATH additions
export PATH="$HOME/bin:$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"

# XDG Base Directory
export XDG_CONFIG_HOME="$HOME/.config"
export XDG_DATA_HOME="$HOME/.local/share"
export XDG_CACHE_HOME="$HOME/.cache"
EOF

#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

case "${1:-}" in
    list)
        echo "=== Current Environment Variables ==="
        env | sort
        ;;
    search)
        if [ -z "${2:-}" ]; then
            echo "Usage: $0 search PATTERN"
            exit 1
        fi
        echo "=== Variables matching '$2' ==="
        env | grep -i "$2"
        ;;
    set)
        if [ -z "${2:-}" ] || [ -z "${3:-}" ]; then
            echo "Usage: $0 set VAR_NAME VAR_VALUE"
            exit 1
        fi
        echo "export $2=\"$3\"" >> ~/.bashrc
        export "$2"="$3"
        echo "âœ“ Set $2=$3 (added to ~/.bashrc)"
        ;;
    unset)
        if [ -z "${2:-}" ]; then
            echo "Usage: $0 unset VAR_NAME"
            exit 1
        fi
        sed -i "/export $2=/d" ~/.bashrc
        unset "$2" 2>/dev/null || true
        echo "âœ“ Unset $2 (removed from ~/.bashrc)"
        ;;
    reload)
        source ~/.bashrc
        echo "âœ“ Reloaded ~/.bashrc"
        ;;
    *)
        echo "Usage: $0 {list|search|set|unset|reload} [args]"
        echo ""
        echo "Examples:"
        echo "  $0 list                    # List all variables"
        echo "  $0 search PATH             # Search for PATH variables"
        echo "  $0 set MY_VAR value        # Set variable"
        echo "  $0 unset MY_VAR            # Unset variable"
        echo "  $0 reload                  # Reload configuration"
        exit 1
        ;;
esac
EOF
